content:
A Lumia Bottle can take you to faraway places,
but anything can happen along the Astralink.
...Including some things we'd rather not remember.

Live life freely, set out with abandon.

...

No, that's just a Lumia bottle advertisement slogan.

So, do you have a destination in mind?
Nearby <color=#97c344>Qianpo</color> is known for its precious gems,
While the more distant <color=#97c344>Taochuan</color> is rich in pottery,

For more information, you can ask Sani,
When it comes to exploration, no one can match the Shifting Winds Society.
